auth.setAuthMethod: Please set an Auth method in your .gemini/settings.json OR specify GEMINI_API_KEY env variable file before running
memory.refreshing: Refreshing hierarchical memory (GEMINI.md or other context files)...
flashFallback.message:
⚡ Slow response times detected. Automatically switching from {0} to {1} for faster responses for the remainder of this session.
⚡ To avoid this you can utilize a Gemini API Key. See: https://goo.gle/gemini-cli-docs-auth#gemini-api-key
⚡ You can switch authentication methods by typing /auth
auth.timeout: Authentication timed out. Please try again.
error.checkApiKeyConfig: Please check API key and configuration.
help.addContextDescription: : Use {0} to specify files for context (e.g., {1}) to target specific files or folders.
help.shellModeDescription: : Execute shell commands via {0} (e.g., {1}) or use natural language (e.g. {2}).
help.jumpWords: - Jump through words in the input
tips.askQuestions: 1. Ask questions, edit files, or run commands.
tips.beSpecific: 2. Be specific for the best results.
tips.createGeminiMd: 3. Create {0} files to customize your interactions with Gemini.
authDialog.mustSelectAuthMethod: You must select an auth method to proceed. Press Ctrl+C twice to exit.
authDialog.termsOfService: Terms of Services and Privacy Notice for Gemini CLI
authInProgress.timedOut: Authentication timed out. Please try again.
authInProgress.waitingForAuth: Waiting for auth... (Press ESC to cancel)
editorDialog.useEnterToSelectTabToChange: (Use Enter to select, Tab to change focus)
editorDialog.supportedEditorsNote: These editors are currently supported. Please note that some editors cannot be used in sandbox mode.
command.locale.description: change the display language. Usage: /locale <language_code> (e.g., en, zh-CN)
command.docs.description: open full Gemini CLI documentation in your browser
command.clear.description: clear the screen and conversation history
command.mcp.description: list configured MCP servers and tools
command.compress.description: Compresses the context by replacing it with a summary.
command.restore.description: restore a tool call. This will reset the conversation and file history to the state it was in when the tool call was suggested
